title: Golf Shorts Men - Men Shorts Casual Dress Lounge Work Athletic Flat Front Stretch Lightweight Quick Dry with Pockets
description: Comfy & Quick-Drying Fabric: Mens golf shorts are made of high-performance fabric that features extreme comfort, lightweight, quick-drying, breathable, and moisture-wicking, with durable properties.

5 Practical Pockets: Golf shorts for men have multiple pockets making them convenient for you to take necessities. 2 deep and curved large side pockets and a small pocket with the capacity to hold golf balls and cards or keys; 2 back pockets for carrying more items.
Moisture Wicking: Men golf shorts has moisture-wicking technology that can move perspiration away from the body to provide a dry fit that's comfortable for all-day wear.
Designed for Golf: The mens shorts 9 inch inseam feature a belt loops help keeping tucked-in shirts and zip fly and button closure provide a secure fit.

Occasion: Mens dress shorts are suitable for golf, hiking, work, surfing, fishing, outdoor sports, business activities, and daily casual wear. Diversified usage scenarios is a good choice for presents, you can choose to give to your husband, child, family, or friends.
